document.full_text: russian-born tennis player anna kournikova is joining the television weight loss contest "the biggest loser" as a trainer, nbc television said on wednesday.
document.title: anna kournikova joins "biggest loser" tv show
lines_and_colors: russian-born tennis player anna kournikova is joining the television weight loss contest "the biggest loser" as a trainer, nbc television said on wednesday.
